fixtures.name: MINI BEAM #1
fixtures.notes:
MINI BEAM 250W Moving Head Light - Professional beam fixture with dual prism system

DMX Channel Specifications:
CH1 - Color Wheel: White (0-4), Red (5-19), Orange (20-34), Aquamarine (35-49), Green (50-64), Light Green (65-79), Yellow (80-94), Pink (95-109), Blue (110-124), Warm White (125-139), Cyan (140-154), CTO variations (155-189), Rotation (200-255)

CH2 - Flash/Strobe: Full Off (0-5), Full On (6-11), Strobe slow-fast (12-107), Pulse open (108-149), Pulse close (150-191), Random strobe (192-251), Full On (252-255)

CH3 - Dimmer: 0-255 Linear dimming from dark to bright

CH4 - Gobo: 17 static gobos (0-53), Rotation forward/backward (54-95), Gobo shake effects (96-245)

CH5 - Prism 1: No prism (0-127), Prism active (128-255)
CH6 - Prism Rotation: Stop (0-10), Forward (11-120), Backward (121-255)
CH7 - Prism 2: Secondary prism system

CH8 - Frost: Linear frost effect 0-255
CH9 - Focus: Pattern clarity adjustment 0-255

CH10 - Pan: 540° horizontal movement (0-255)
CH11 - Pan Fine: 1.2° fine adjustment
CH12 - Tilt: 270° vertical movement (0-255) 
CH13 - Tilt Fine: 1.2° fine adjustment

CH14 - Function/Speed: Pan/Tilt speed macro (0-255)
CH15 - Reset: No effect (0-239), Reset (240-255)
CH16 - Lamp: Lamp Off (100-105), Lamp On (200-205), Reset (250-255)

Physical Specs:
- Pan: 540° range
- Tilt: 270° range 
- Dual prism system for advanced beam effects
- 17 rotating gobos with shake effects
- Color wheel with 20+ colors including CTOs
- Professional frost and focus control
